title: A Room with a View
description: Published in 1908,  A Room with A View is one of E.M. Forster's most celebrated works. Forster explores love among a cast of characters gathered in an Italian pension and a Surrey village. Caught up in a world of social snobbery, Lucy Honeychurch must make a decision that will decide the course of her future: she is forced to choose between convention and passion.
author: E.M. Forster
